Html:
Hi everybody (from Slovenia),

first of, great control!

I've set up a Mapserver on windows, made my own .Map file to create map.

Installed KaMap for tilecache purposes.

Any ideas how to implement my map inside GMap.NET?

- Already added my map to MapTypes, altered MakeImageUrl but the map is not in the correct scale and a little shifted.

- Anybody played with that ?

- Whats are the scales for zoom levels in other maps ?

Thanks

Blaz

hey!

first, you must know what projection you use, and the size of tiles

Hi,

TileSize 256X256

In MapServer Map file I use

"wms_srs"   "EPSG:4326"   so it should be longlat, WGS84

it is WMS, already fot it working with corrections on MapType.MapBenderWMS

but kamap has server side tile caching. Or you have any other suggestion.

THX
so you have tiles on your server? Can you grant me readonly access for testing?

I'm behind company firewall, I'll try but it could take days.

One other question. Can I raise maxzoom from 17 to lets say 18,19,... for other and my WMS source (it's working on on maps.google.com)
